languages.text: "С самого начала это было рискованно, элантах. Я рада, что ты передумал{mf||а}".

traits.locale_text: "С самого начала это было рискованно, элантах. Я рада, что ты передумал{mf||а}".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "This was risky from the very beginning, elantach. I am glad you have changed your mind."
languages.original_text: "С самого начала это было рискованно, элантах. Я рада, что ты передумал{mf||а}".

traits.locale_text: "This was risky from the very beginning, elantach. I am glad you have changed your mind."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This was risky from the very beginning, elantach. I am glad you have changed your mind."

traits.locale_text: "This was risky from the very beginning, elantach. I am glad you have changed your mind."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Esto ha sido un riesgo desde el principio, elantach. Me alegro de que hayas cambiado de opinión».
languages.original_text: "This was risky from the very beginning, elantach. I am glad you have changed your mind."

traits.locale_text: «Esto ha sido un riesgo desde el principio, elantach. Me alegro de que hayas cambiado de opinión».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「最初から危うかったぞ、エランタ。思い直してくれてよかった」
languages.original_text: "This was risky from the very beginning, elantach. I am glad you have changed your mind."

traits.locale_text: 「最初から危うかったぞ、エランタ。思い直してくれてよかった」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “这件事从一开始就有风险，外界人。我很高兴你改了主意。”
languages.original_text: "This was risky from the very beginning, elantach. I am glad you have changed your mind."

traits.locale_text: “这件事从一开始就有风险，外界人。我很高兴你改了主意。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « C'était risqué dès le départ, elantach. Je suis heureuse que vous ayez changé d'avis. »
languages.original_text: "This was risky from the very beginning, elantach. I am glad you have changed your mind."

traits.locale_text: « C'était risqué dès le départ, elantach. Je suis heureuse que vous ayez changé d'avis. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Es ist einfach zu riskant, Elantach. Ich bin froh, dass Ihr es Euch anders überlegt habt."
languages.original_text: "This was risky from the very beginning, elantach. I am glad you have changed your mind."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist einfach zu riskant, Elantach. Ich bin froh, dass Ihr es Euch anders überlegt habt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Yaptığımız şey, en başından beri riskliydi elantach. Fikrini değiştirmene sevindim."
languages.original_text: "This was risky from the very beginning, elantach. I am glad you have changed your mind."

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, yaptığımız şey en başından beri riskliydi. Fikrini değiştirdiğine memnunum."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
